com.mindfusion.charting

Class PlotController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.charting.PlotController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.mindfusion.charting.components.ComponentController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LegendController, Plot2DController, RotationController

    public class PlotController
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.mindfusion.charting.components.ComponentController
    A base class for controllers implementing user interaction with Plot components.
